verses.verse: Lo <S%H5869><s%>, mine eye hath seen <S%H7200><s%> all this <S%H241><s%>, Mine ear hath heard <S%H8085><s%> and understood it <S%H995><s%>.
What ye know <S%H1847><s%>, the same do I know <S%H3045><s%> also <S%H5307><s%>: I am not inferior unto you.
Surely <S%H199><s%> I would speak <S%H1696><s%> to the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, And I desire <S%H2654><s%> to reason <S%H3198><s%> with God <S%H410><s%>.
But <S%H199><s%> ye are forgers <S%H2950><s%> of lies <S%H8267><s%>; Ye are all physicians <S%H7495><s%> of no value <S%H457><s%>.
Oh that <S%H5414><s%> ye would altogether <S%H2790><s%> hold your peace <S%H2790><s%>! And it would be your wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> now my reasoning <S%H8433><s%>, And hearken <S%H7181><s%> to the pleadings <S%H7379><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%>.
Will ye speak <S%H1696><s%> unrighteously <S%H5766><s%> for God <S%H410><s%>, And talk <S%H1696><s%> deceitfully for him <S%H7423><s%>?
Will ye show <S%H5375><s%> partiality <S%H6440><s%> to him <S%H7378><s%>? Will ye contend for God <S%H410><s%>?
Is it good <S%H2895><s%> that he should search you out <S%H2713><s%>? Or as one <S%H582><s%> deceiveth <S%H2048><s%> a man <S%H2048><s%>, will ye deceive him?
He will surely <S%H3198><s%> reprove <S%H3198><s%> you <S%H5643><s%>, If ye do secretly show <S%H5375><s%> partiality <S%H6440><s%>.
Shall not his majesty <S%H7613><s%> make you afraid <S%H1204><s%>, And his dread <S%H6343><s%> fall upon you <S%H5307><s%>?
Your memorable <S%H2146><s%> sayings are <S%H4912><s%> proverbs of ashes <S%H665><s%>, Your defences <S%H1354><s%> are defences <S%H1354><s%> of clay <S%H2563><s%>.
Hold your peace <S%H2790><s%>, let me alone <S%H1696><s%>, that I may speak; And let come on me what will <S%H5674><s%>.
Wherefore should I take <S%H5375><s%> my flesh <S%H1320><s%> in my teeth <S%H8127><s%>, And put <S%H7760><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%> in my hand <S%H3709><s%>?
Behold <S%H2005><s%>, he will slay <S%H6991><s%> me <S%H3176><s%>; I have no hope: Nevertheless I will maintain <S%H3198><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%>.
This also shall be my salvation <S%H3444><s%>, That a godless <S%H2611><s%> man shall not come <S%H935><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> diligently <S%H8085><s%> my speech <S%H4405><s%>, And let my declaration <S%H262><s%> be in your ears <S%H241><s%>.
Behold now <S%H6186><s%>, I have set my cause <S%H4941><s%> in order <S%H3045><s%>; I know that I am righteous <S%H6663><s%>.
Who is he that will contend <S%H7378><s%> with me <S%H2790><s%>? For then would I hold my peace and give up the ghost <S%H1478><s%>.
Only do <S%H6213><s%> not two <S%H8147><s%> things unto me <S%H5641><s%>; Then will I not hide myself from thy face <S%H6440><s%>:
Withdraw <S%H7368><s%> thy hand <S%H3709><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H367><s%>; And let not thy terror make me afraid <S%H1204><s%>.
Then call <S%H7121><s%> thou <S%H6030><s%>, and I will answer; Or let me speak <S%H1696><s%>, and answer thou me <S%H7725><s%>.
How many are mine iniquities <S%H5771><s%> and sins <S%H2403><s%>? Make me to know <S%H3045><s%> my transgression <S%H6588><s%> and my sin <S%H2403><s%>.
Wherefore hidest <S%H5641><s%> thou thy face <S%H6440><s%>, And holdest <S%H2803><s%> me for thine enemy <S%H341><s%>?
Wilt thou harass <S%H6206><s%> a driven <S%H5086><s%> leaf <S%H5929><s%>? And wilt thou pursue <S%H7291><s%> the dry <S%H3002><s%> stubble <S%H7179><s%>?
For thou writest <S%H3789><s%> bitter things <S%H4846><s%> against me <S%H3423><s%>, And makest me to inherit the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of my youth <S%H5271><s%>:

Thou puttest <S%H7760><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> also in the stocks <S%H5465><s%>, And markest <S%H8104><s%> all my paths <S%H734><s%>; Thou settest a bound <S%H2707><s%> to the soles <S%H8328><s%> of my feet <S%H7272><s%>:
Though I am like a rotten thing <S%H7538><s%> that consumeth <S%H1086><s%>, Like a garment <S%H899><s%> that is moth <S%H6211><s%> - eaten <S%H398><s%>.
